careers.title: Senior React Developer
careers.description: This position offers a unique opportunity to progress your development skills and assist with mentorship of the team utilizing the latest software tools and technologies. It's an excellent choice to continue your career growth within an innovative and supportive company.

careers.title: Food Tester
careers.description: We are seeking an enthusiastic and hands-on Food Technologist who is able to drive delivery of food quality and compliance to support our growing company. You will be responsible for delivering operational excellence by implementing quality assurance activities and initiatives across the entire range of Restaurant Brands ingredients and products. The ideal candidate will need to have strong interpersonal skills as they will be establishing working relationships with suppliers and providing food technology support for supply chain management, operations and marketing for both new product development and non-new product development projects.
